name: Tara Smith
review: The trainers ata Avada Gym have helped me reach my fitness goals beyond anything I could of hoped for. I love it!

name: Simon Chel
review: The atmosphere at Avada Gym is amazing, the people are even better. All in all, it is a great place to work out.

name: Jen Wirth
review: The facilities at Avada Gym stood out to me the most. They are well maintained and have high quality equipment

name: Jeff Glum
review: No bad things to say about Avada Gym, they are top notch at every corner and tryly take care of their customers
